column1: #text='' I love everything about libraries ; their quiet atmosphere , comfortable chairs , and rows and rows of books on every topic .
#text=I do n't have enough money to go out and buy books whenever I want , so I often go to the library to borrow books for free .
#text=Recently , I decided to go to the library and just browse until I found something interesting .
#text=I drove to the library and parked close to the door , since I expected to leave with an armful of heavy books .
#text=I walked inside and headed for the Fiction section .
#text=I ended up in the row for authors with last names starting with K , because I wanted to find Stephen King books .
#text=They ended up having a dozen books by Stephen King , and I selected three that I had never read before .
#text=Then I went over to Nonfiction to find a book on gardening , since I wanted to learn how to grow tomato plants .
#text=I picked up a gigantic , fantastically long book on how to grow common vegetables and walked over to the reception desk .
#text=I handed the librarian my card and she checked out my books .
#text=I gathered them up in my arms and walked back to my car , excited to be able to read them all once I got home .
